ai-tha-ap482:1.1_0: “I used to have a small sea
ai-tha-ap482:1.2_0: “In the wilderness, I’m sitting in the wilderness,
ai-tha-ap482:2.2_0: I was walking mindfully in the open air.
ai-tha-ap482:2.4_0: the glorious one, the Holy One,
ai-tha-ap482:3.2_0: And a sprinkled me on a journey.
ai-tha-ap482:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap482:3.4_0: this is the fellow of the fruit.
ai-tha-ap482:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap482:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piṅgiyānī.
ai-tha-ap482:8.1_0: (Asoka) made the ten Elders forty Elders.
ai-tha-ap482:9.1_0: The eighth sub-chapter on nakedness is finished.
